Class PowerGenBalancingLoadSheddingAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • protopeer.BasePeerlet
      • core.SFINAAgent

          • applications.CascadeAgent
            • applications.BenchmarkDomainAgent
              • applications.PowerGenBalancingLoadSheddingAgent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SimulationAgentInterface, protopeer.Peerlet

    public class PowerGenBalancingLoadSheddingAgent
extends BenchmarkDomainAgent
    Strategy to make load flow analysis converge. Balancing generation limits and shedding load.

      • flowConvergenceStrategy

        public boolean flowConvergenceStrategy(FlowNetwork flowNetwork)
        Description copied from class: SFINAAgent
        Domain specific strategy and/or necessary adjustments before loadflow simulation is executed. Power: For current island, turn first generator into slack if it doesn't exist yet.
        Specified by:
        flowConvergenceStrategy in interface SimulationAgentInterface
        Overrides:
        flowConvergenceStrategy in class SFINAAgent
        Returns:
        true if flow analysis finally converged, else false
